title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/cheatsheet
author: Mario Pietsch
name: Cheatsheet TW WikiText
readme:
This plugin adds the [[Wikitext Cheatsheet]] overview to your wiki.

''Cheatsheet Settings''

This plugin adds 2 new "Show Wikitext Cheatsheet" buttons and an editor-shortcut to your wiki

* A "Cheatsheet" button is added as a "page button"
* A "Cheatsheet" button is added to the edit toolbars .. Shortcut <kbd>F1</kbd>
